website_summaries.verdict: Very inexpensive screen that is a good option if you have a wall big enough to hang it.
pros: Comes with hooks and bungee cords for attaching to a wall
Can fold small enough to fit in a backpack for easy portability
Great for indoor or outdoor use
cons: This screen does not come with a frame and does not have a black side

customer_reviews.title: Nice and does not crease!
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant screen. East to out up and comes with the cord and hooks. It really made a difference with my projector and can't wait to get outside with it. It does not crease either!! I was really surprised and just love mine. As soon as the kids seen it come in they wanted a movie night indoors. I'll have to come back when I get pics and see if I can add them or a video because all the kids invited their friends and I totally forgot to show everyone how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary chadwell

customer_reviews.title: Super flexible and handy
customer_reviews.text: Super flexible and handy, i never have to worry about any wringkles... but can be sensitive to dirt but washable...
customer_reviews.author: Johann

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: Not too upset because it was only $30 but the quality of this product it’s not what I expected. It is almost impossible to keep the black boarder straight due to the elastic material this screen is made of. If you don’t stretch it the black boarder sags. If you try to prevent the black boarder from sagging you have to stretch the material which makes the screen look like a web shape. As you can see in the picture the screen is super thin and you can see right through it. Definitely one of those “get what you pay for”. I will more than likely be replacing this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Really good screen, better than others here
customer_reviews.text: I really like this screen. I had previously bought a 120" one, but it was very thin. I could see paneling and a plugin cover behind it. Returned it, and bought this one based on reviews saying it wasn't too thin. This was easy to put up, and looks great. I saw a few people said that there were wrinkles when they got their screen, but I can't notice any wrinkles at all with the screen up. Projector looks great on it(only 300 ansi) too. Really happy with this screen and company for making my basement fun for movies and video gaming. Would happily buy other items from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: total fail
customer_reviews.text: This product is not the size it says it is about 20 % smaller, the only way I could get it even close to 100 inches was to stretch it quite tight which made it look grotesque . The mounting system they send with it will not hold the weight of the screen they are super cheap knock off versions of the command strip hangers, the ones did manage to stick , when I pulled the tab did not release and took paint of my wall. I will be returning immediately for a refund . I wasted my time trying to install it by the time I had one side up the other side was falling down ...
customer_reviews.author: daniel harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was considering making one of these but how can you go wrong getting a 100" for only $30. Nice quality and perfect for outdoors. Not sure why I see pics of spiderweb designs in reviews...but will take that into consideration for Halloween night. I am holding up with the provided hooks and getting as close to a rectangular display as possible. Am also casting about 97", not 100" so don't need to stretch out either.
customer_reviews.author: AntJustAnt

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This projector screen lives up to expectations. When you project the image, it is nice and clear. The screen also comes with removable-stick-on hooks, which don’t damage your walls. In addition to that, it is easy to fold, comes with a plastic bag/case, and ropes (if you would like to hang it somewhere. This was a great purchase, and I recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and hardware included!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and comes with a supply of adhesive (Command style) hooks and roping for hanging. Only complaint (slight) is that the plastic zippered pouch it is stored in came with two holes in it but the screen itself was fine. I bought to use when RVing but can see using at home for sports and movie night with the kiddos. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CapnEMO

customer_reviews.title: A great quality screen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good and light-weight screen. We used heavy duty staples to stretch this over the wall and we had no wrinkles at all. We really don't like the wrinkles as it can be noticeable when watching movies or playing games. only problem with stretching it out is that one side always seems to be off. This is because of the uneven amount of stretch on the top and bottom, though our projection was still perfect, so I think it is worth having one side look weird. The hooks it comes with was pretty crappy, so I don't recommend using them. one came off and took paint off my wall.
customer_reviews.author: CrimSoul

customer_reviews.title: Found a good one with a good price
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching the projector screen for my living room. Found a good one with a good price. It is easy to set up when the installation package is included. I dont have to pay extra for the installation kit. The screen is foldable so that I can put it back in the package easily. Its also anti-cease. I have been placed the screen in my living room for like 5 days. The screen is still clean enough which gives a better pics from my projector. I would recommend it more than the screen with the fixed bar. You can carry this screen to anywhere without any difficulties.
customer_reviews.author: Hieu Tran

customer_reviews.title: Real easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Real easy to set up. But I had to buy the bigger version of the non-damaging sticky hooks because my wall is textured otherwise the ones that come in the kit would have worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: littlebear25

customer_reviews.title: After having for a few months finally decided to get ...
customer_reviews.text: After having for a few months finally decided to get out and use for THE OHIO STATE football game VS Penn State if anyone was wondering...lol It Works very well, had it on the side of my shed, shed is light brown and that did not effect it at all. Plan on building a light weight frame to attach it to for transport for camping and such
customer_reviews.author: JCJC

customer_reviews.title: It worked for the first month fine and then the material starts to stretch out and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for just about a month and the screen is stretched out and sagging all on sides. Will attempt to contact the manufacturer to see if they will rectify the screen. It worked for the first month fine and then the material starts to stretch out and sag.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Portable and foldable
customer_reviews.text: This screen projector is basically a white cloth that u can fold and of course very portable. It comes with strings and these stick-on hangers i assume is just a one time use, unfortunately. But overall it works well and can carry it wherever.
customer_reviews.author: Grands.Lam

customer_reviews.title: There is better options.
customer_reviews.text: Very transparent, so watch what your putting in front of. The included hangers are worthless, just toss them in the trash. Used thicker sewing pins and slightly bent them to actually make it work. Ultimately sent back and wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Colwell

customer_reviews.title: It was better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised. It was better than I thought! It does not wrinkle. Packaged nicely with all hardware. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey Shack

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: The quality is really good for the price. PERFECT size! The pictures shows very clear with good color. My family and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So fun to have a home theater. This is the perfect size for me. Plus, when I hung it outside I suspended it between 2 trees and people watched THE movie perfectly from BOTH SIDES!
customer_reviews.author: brown eyes

customer_reviews.title: Came in dirty and with creases
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box and the screen was dirty with big black lines in some parts, probably caused by the black borders that would have transferred to the white. I'm quite afraid of washing it if the black border transfers. It came with lots of wrinkles/creases. Can I iron it? Probably not. Hooks don't stick that much, especially when you put a bit of tension. Does not catch much more light than my white wall. At least I don't see a tremendous difference. No return possible !!! What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wrinkles haven't been an issue since the first night. Kids love watching a movie outdoors. The hooks to hang it could be of better quality, I had to go buy new, stronger ones because the onces that came with the product kept falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara R.

customer_reviews.title: Best screen valuea
customer_reviews.text: Very nice screen makes my no HD projector look HD. Very light and easy to fold and setup. Very stretchy, little larger that printer dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Pollack

customer_reviews.title: Good screen
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses it daily. Well constructed. Has some elasticity. Stretches well and stays tight.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: I love my screen
customer_reviews.text: I love my screen. It’s so beautiful and I constantly get compliments on it. The screen surface is awesome. Guests assumed that I paid a lot for it, until I tell them and they’re blown away.
customer_reviews.author: daphne sims

customer_reviews.title: This "anti-crease" screen came with creases (see pics). Lol ...
customer_reviews.text: This "anti-crease" screen came with creases (see pics). Lol. Impossible to keep the edges straight. Gets the job done but I would consider this *very* entry level.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We used this screen at our church for showing slides for a special event. We installed it in our fellowship area with just a few extra supplies from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schuess

customer_reviews.title: Great picture on this screen
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, stretchy material. Great picture on this projector screen. Def' recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This screen protector is the greatest gift I could bring my husband for Father’s Day, he wanted to hatch the mondial soccer game in big screen and with this screen I had his dream come true.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Get the "Roll" Type
customer_reviews.text: Way too flimsy, thin and stretchy. I cant imagine anyone mounting this and being happy. Used it for Halloween ghost :)
customer_reviews.author: Frederick of Ormrod

customer_reviews.title: Great product I use project the picture onto my wall
customer_reviews.text: Great product I use project the picture onto my wall. Well not any more becuase this bad boy is vivid.
customer_reviews.author: Cwell

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Awful the worst ever! I threw my money away they will not let me return this. Pure garbage! Like a cheap shirt or sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: It works but is bright enough, if you wont ...
customer_reviews.text: It works but is bright enough, if you wont the typical forward projection then pay the additional 20ish buck for a pull down, so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Skearns

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: This projector screen is huge and it comes with all the mounting hardware. I deducted one start because the screen had a small dirt spot on one side of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: ergibson83

customer_reviews.title: A decent projection screen
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. But one big problem is the permanent vertical wrinkles on the screen. I tried the hair drier option. Worked well on other small wrinkles but not on the vertical ones caused due to the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: S. SHOBHANA

customer_reviews.title: Came marked
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried the product yet but opened it to see it,not sure if this can be washed but it came with a stain on it other than that came fast and was packaged up well so little confused why it’s dirty :/
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a mini projector and this screen is the perfect complement to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Sánchez

customer_reviews.title: The product was great just becarful with stretching can damage the stitching.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product i baught a projector also from amazon so i needed a screen and let me Tell you did not disappoint. great pic super clear and did not let a lot of light threw great bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew slusher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with a band of stain in the middle about 3 feet long....Returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chou

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty much a soft white sheet
customer_reviews.text: It pretty much is a thick soft white sheet It came with mounting brackets and nylon rope set it up twice in an outside patio with no issues
customer_reviews.author: henry m.

customer_reviews.title: wrinkle free and crisp picture
customer_reviews.text: it was wrinkle-free out of the package, and the picture quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: LucasP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!! Cloth material
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect!! Cloth material, super stretchy and very easily portable. Super easy to put up and image is quality for a projector.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. No wrinkles on screen. Easy to hang and take down. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this screen is AMAZING! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with a Vankyo 410 and havent had any issues at all. It included 3m type wall hooks and is more like a thick white cotton sheet . I thought it would be cheap but i use this as my everyday Tv. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G

customer_reviews.title: Being a huge soccer fan, I always wanted to ...
customer_reviews.text: Being a huge soccer fan, I always wanted to watch FIFA world cup 2018 in a big screen. This makes my wish come true. Saved me 1000 bucks. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Norsang Lama

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The screen tore as we were stretching it to attach it to our wall. Didn’t even get to watch anything on it, we ended up having a bedsheet do the job..
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Sommer

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it for movie night
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, the picture looks great and my kids love it for movie night
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: It is soft like a bed sheet, but it is easy to set-up and move around wherever you want. I never really got the edges straight, as it has to be stretched, but then, for watching movies/videos in a place I won't normally watch, it doesn't make too much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: ... all other reviews and I am not at all disappointed. Easy installation and great quality- I love this
customer_reviews.text: I relied on all other reviews and I am not at all disappointed. Easy installation and great quality- I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The screen is just as advertised. Easy to hang up, easy to store with no wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy material misleading pictures
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good or well described screen. Very flimsy material, think your grandma’s underpants. Impossible to have it hang as pictured in ad. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Video customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product is really nice. Easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as a birthday present to go with his new projector. The quality of the product is really nice. Easy to hang. Easy to store. The issue I had, was that when my son opened it up, there was a big dirty shoe print on it! I didn't really appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: khubbard

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had it up for a year currently using thumb tacks between the holes provided (apartment living) until I can properly mount it in my permanent home.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Love how it makes what ever movie or show I ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen shows real clear, looks HD. Love how it makes what ever movie or show I am watching come to life. I recommend this brand for anyone who is looking for a good quality projector screen.😊😊😊😊😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: TiaB

customer_reviews.title: Not for permanent setup
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think that it is going to attach to a wall and be a straight rectangle. It is too stretchy and it distorts the edges. Probably good for temporary use, but not the product for a home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R Strawser

customer_reviews.title: Bought 1 and it had a 4 foot stain in ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 and it had a 4 foot stain in the middle of the screen. Ordered a second one hoping to get a clean one, and it arrived with a 5 foot stain and wrinkles that the first did not have. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: joshua c

customer_reviews.title: Great screen.
customer_reviews.text: The screen itself is great buy the plastic prices sent to you to attach it to the wall are awful and do not stick. Be prepared to buy some command hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kari F.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times. Is pretty wrinkle free. Little clips with double tape are good.
customer_reviews.author: Holtzinger Family

customer_reviews.title: Mights well use a wall, comes in better
customer_reviews.text: Weren't very impressed, used for a mini projector. Lost all the quality of the picture. Comes in better on the wall. Light penitrates right through it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry hurd

customer_reviews.title: ... said I was purchasing was what I received only better. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what they said I was purchasing was what I received only better. Very happy with this purchase. It’s made for some fun movie nights!
customer_reviews.author: B.Rolls

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great all the way around! This Helped make our daughter's drive in movie theme a huge success!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems great so far. It's flexible and easy to mount to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Comes with assessories to setup
customer_reviews.text: Considerate manufacturer that provides 2 sets of hooks and strings for easy setup. Screen does basic function.
customer_reviews.author: Zeal

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Installation accessories that are included make screen install a snap.
customer_reviews.author: GOD'S PRO

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size with great performance! Excellent customer service for any questions you might have as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Habelmann

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and the picture looks amazing! They offer great customer service as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 12 inches bigger than listed I cannot use and cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: 12 inches bigger than listed I cannot use and cannot return to Amazon. I now have a screen I cannot use. Update, taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bayton

customer_reviews.title: That was where the screen was supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: The screen itself does its job, except for a fact that the hooks don’t really hold up. Even after duct taping. It’s quite sad actually. I would try hanging the screen, except that my room has no space for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Ephy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It’s stretchy so couple bungy cords will set it up
customer_reviews.author: Harby

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice screen that’s easy to set up my only problem was that it came with a stain that goes across half the screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Bought last second for a game.. Easy setup you can't go wrong for the price
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: it is very uneven at the edges so i stapled to wooden wall and i will leave it up
customer_reviews.text: you need to staple it to a wood frame to get an even edge. i have rustic pine walls to staple to. I would say get 1by 2 wood strips and staple edge even to them. then you could roll it up like a scroll.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible won’t stay on the wall and is basically a piece of fabric. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: With a little creativity for mounting options which are a ton this screen is versatile. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GR8 PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I was very scared that I would have ugly unwanted wrinkles but the material of this product is stretchy and really helped get rid of any wrinkles that it had. Very easy to set up. Sadly my room was too small for the screen but I don’t want any other screen so I made folded it to make it fit a bit smaller. If you want a screen This is the one. I’m literally so happy with this product that I had to leave a review. Ignore the messy room it’s still under construction but just wanted to show the screen.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. So angry with those jokes of anchors
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. So angry with those jokes of anchors. So ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Good value, reasonable performance.
customer_reviews.text: The picture on the website is somewhat deceiving. This is much like a "shiny bedsheet" with good reflectivity but it's not outstanding. Good value overall but if you have a dim viewing area or want higher quality video, you probably need to upsize a bit.
customer_reviews.author: SteveinMA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of this screen. It stretches like spandex material and removes any wringles. It worked well with the homemade screen stand I made out of 1” PVC pipe.
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: There is hole in screen and to my surprise we can not return the product.. please do not buy and waste your money.. not worth..
customer_reviews.author: Accord

customer_reviews.title: Terrible screen
customer_reviews.text: This screen is a very thin fabric. There is no way we can project and see anything on this flimsy sheet . Poor craftsmanship.To make it worse it is ineligible for returns! I would have never bought it if I had known it was this bad
customer_reviews.author: SAT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Home Movies!!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is fantastic. It’s really good quality fabric. It works beautifully for home movies.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Panamá

product_meta.title: Owlenz 100 inch Projection Screen 16:9 HD Foldable Anti-Crease Portable Projector Movies Screen for Home Theater Outdoor Indoor Support Double Sided Projection, 2 lbs Only
feature_bullets: CONVENIENT TO STORAGE AND CARRY - Compact one-piece,lightweight and folding design. You can fold the screen in small size and put it in your backpack or suitcase
WIDE APPLICATION - Ideal choice for home theater movie, education, conference room presentation, public display, outdoor movie and more

ANTI-CREASE AND HIGH ABSORBANCE MATERIAL - Made with natural Polyester fabric that The projection is sharper and brighter than most other projection screens, The Projection Screen are thicken and smooth, no wrinkle when folded / crushed.
EASY TO SET UP ¨C The Projection Screen can be fastened easily with hooks, ropes, bracket, nails, double side tape on the wall/mount.
FORMAT AND SIZE - 16:9 screen format, diagonal 120" offer 104" x 58" viewing area

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars207 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
